## String\_2.hasSoftWrapOpportunity() function

Checks whether the string contains soft wrap opportunities [https://drafts.csswg.org/css-text-4/\#line-breaking](https://drafts.csswg.org/css-text-4/#line-breaking)

**Signature:**

```typescript
function hasSoftWrapOpportunity(input: string): boolean;
```

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

## Remarks

Spaces are always soft break points. Other are hard to correctly detect. We do not want here to have a full break point detection which, based on language, requires lexical analysis. We accept visible hyphens (U+002D - HYPHEN-MINUS and U+2010 ‚Äê HYPHEN) that are explicitly called out in CSS hyphens definition. [https://drafts.csswg.org/css-text-4/\#hyphens-property](https://drafts.csswg.org/css-text-4/#hyphens-property)
